briefdescription.para: E Constant that measure the energy quantity of the player.
DD Constant that measure the planet general health.
documentation above
Create a new map.

detaileddescription.para: In order to begin a new game, we need a board game. It will contains all the map information concerning machines emplacement, sources, resources, garbage, Staff and gate, presents on the map.

Difficulty has been chosen by the player which determine the width and height of the map Creation of the map : a bi dimensional Case table 2 sources cases and 1 transdimensional gate are randomly placed into those cases. The player starts the game with 5 FISE, 5 FISA, 100 E and 100 DD. Initialization of the turn, the score the pollution to 0. By default, the FISA production is E. A table which contain staffs that the user bought is also initialized

parameterdescription.para: a valid difficulty chosen by the user

simplesect.para: a new map that contains all the map information
Map type
Difficulty enum

briefdescription.para: Destroy a map.

detaileddescription.para:
m
a map
At the end of a game, we need to free all the memory allocated to a map.
We have to free : Staff* team Case** map ... (map.h , staff.f, machine.h)

simplesect.para: an error that specify what is the problem
Map type

briefdescription.para: Hire a FISE.

detaileddescription.para: We hire a FISE in order to product more resources. Every turn, each FISE student produce 1 E and 1 DD A student (FISE or FISA) costs 50 E and 20 DD.
A verification is necessary to know if the player can hire a new FISE. We have to check resources E and DD of the player

simplesect.para: an error that specify what is the problem
Map type

briefdescription.para: Hire a FISA.

detaileddescription.para: We hire a FISA in order to product more resources. Every 2 turns, each FISA student produce either 4 E or 4 DD
A student (FISE or FISA) costs 50 E and 20 DD.
A verification is necessary to know if the player can hire a new FISA. We have to check resources E and DD of the player

simplesect.para: an error that specify what is the problem
Map type

briefdescription.para: Switch the energy type produced by the FISA.

detaileddescription.para: This function allow us to switch the energy type produced by the FISA between E or DD.

simplesect.para: an error that specify what is the problem
Map type

briefdescription.para: Finish a turn.

detaileddescription.para:
Verifications to do at the end of a turn
Check FISA and FISE production
Update E
Call all conveyor belt/cross at the same time.
Resources moves
Verify each resource destination
next case empty then resource is lost
next case is an ENTRY machine -> send to machine
Check if we produce resources (sources)
Check if we produce wastes (gate)
Call all Recycling center
stored garbage don't decrease DD
10 garbage produce 1 /per turn
Call all collectors
activated from top to bot, left to right
No source then do nothing
randomly choose a source among all adjacent ones
Update DD value

simplesect.para: an error that specify what is the problem

This header contains any functions related to the interactions between the player and the elements on the board game.
create a new map
destroy a map
hire a FISE
hire a FISA
switch energy type produced by the FISA
finish a turn
add a machine in a case
upgrade a machine, already created in a case
detroy a machine, already created in a case
buy staffs in order to have bonus
